author: Tighe McAsey
title: Canvas grade different to autograder
question: I received 100  on autograder for pset 4, however, my grade in canvas shows a 75. Is this due to an autograder change or grading error?
student_answer: I believe this would be because a portion of your problem set grade is from TA assessment (25% if its short assessment, 50% if it is long) in your lab, and the canvas grade shows the overall mark, not just the autograder score.
